abstract: In the latest twist in a global patent fight between the two companies, the ruling said Apple had not infringed on Samsung patents relating to mobile messaging technology.
snippet: In the latest twist in a global patent fight between the two companies, the ruling said Apple had not infringed on Samsung patents relating to mobile messaging technology.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO — A court in South Korea on Thursday dismissed a lawsuit from Samsung Electronics in which the company had sought to block sales of certain Apple phones and tablet computers in South Korea.

headline.main: Korean Court Rejects Samsung Lawsuit Against Apple
